Water Bottle: Discard at any time to lower Danger Meter by 3

Cavalry Sabre: It's very heavy and quite sharp. Your psychic senses tell you this is an important item.

Large Wooden Dowel: Your psychic senses tell you this is an important item. Fighting roll + 2

Truck Key: A truck key you found in a lockbox. Your psychic senses tell you this is an important item.
